Get A list of preprints from the OSF

Source: R/osf.R
osf_preprint_list.Rd

Get A list of preprints from the OSF

Usage

osf_preprint_list(
  provider = NULL,
  date_created = NULL,
  date_modified = NULL,
  max_n = 10
)

Arguments

provider

a vector of the preprint providers, e.g. psyarxiv, socarxiv, edarxiv (see https://osf.io/preprints/discover)

date_created

a single date or a vector of two date (min and max)

date_modified

a single date or a vector of two date (min and max)

max_n

the maximum number of entries to return (will be rounded up to the nearest 10)

Value

a table of preprint info

Examples

# \donttest{
  dc <- c("2025-09-01", "2025-10-01")
  pp <- osf_preprint_list("psyarxiv", date_created = dc)
  files <- pp$primary_file
# }
